inclusion.criterion: apartment can accommodate the device EzyGain
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: evaluation of accessibility of home by EzyGain team
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: first visit takes place on site with investigator/APA investigator and an investigator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: evaluation of spontaneous physical activity of patient by actimetry for seven days + QAPPA
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: beginning of training phase on the device
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: each patient performs a minimum of 3 sessions per week with investigator/APA investigator for 4 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: evaluation of spontaneous physical activity of patient by actimetry for seven days + QAPPA after training phase
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: availability at home during their participation period
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: impossibility of installing the device at home
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: severe cognitive impairment with risk of using the device alone, outside of instructions
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: absence of a caregiver to follow a continuous training of the physiotherapist/APA investigator
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has asthma and uses inhaled corticosteroid (ICS) and fluticasone 500 mcg/salmeterol 50 mcg. He has a history of frequent cough, wheezing, and shortness of breath. His symptoms improve within 1-2 hours outside the workplace.
